Name: TubeSliderCrystal
Notes: An unfinished crystal cage intended for tube slides. It also loads the StarPieceDummy model as well as a Break model, however, the latter never appears. The model files are missing, though. It is clearly unfinished, seeing that it doesn't emit particles or sound effects either. When touched, the player receives eight Star Bits. It needs to be linked to a proper TubeSlider instance.

Obj_arg0.Name: Initial Angle
Obj_arg0.Description: The angle around the tube slide at which the object gets positioned initially.

Obj_arg1.Name: Edge Offset
Obj_arg1.Description: The offset from the tube's edge at which the object should be placed. Default is 0.
